questions.question: What is finding HK-2024-001 about?
questions.ground_truth: HK-2024-001 concerns trade reconciliation control gaps in the Fixed Income operations.

questions.question: Who is responsible for the AML monitoring finding?
questions.ground_truth: The Chief Compliance Officer is responsible for finding HK-2024-007.

questions.question: What is the HKMA regulation referenced for technology risk?
questions.ground_truth: HKMA SPM TM-G-1 covers Technology Risk Management.

questions.question: What are the critical findings in the Hong Kong branch?
questions.ground_truth: Finding HK-2024-001 (trade reconciliation) is rated Critical severity.

questions.question: Which Singapore finding relates to data retention?
questions.ground_truth: SG-2024-011 relates to PDPA data retention non-compliance.

questions.question: What is the deadline for the access control review?
questions.ground_truth: The access control review (SG-2024-003) has a deadline of 2026-04-30.

questions.question: What MAS regulation applies to the Singapore findings?
questions.ground_truth: MAS TRMG (Technology Risk Management Guidelines) and MAS Notice 626 apply.

questions.question: How many open findings are there across APAC?
questions.ground_truth: There are multiple open findings including HK-2024-007, SG-2024-003, SG-2024-011, JP-2024-002.

questions.question: What is the severity of finding SG-2024-003?
questions.ground_truth: Finding SG-2024-003 is rated Significant severity.

questions.question: Which finding is most overdue?
questions.ground_truth: HK-2024-007 has the earliest deadline (2026-02-28) and is still Open.
